name: Protocol VR
description: By signing below, you agree to follow the Protocol. Protocol is a program of strict rules created to make first contact with an alien life form that got shot down in the Arctic Circle.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 or higher 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
